Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses Reroute near Wacker/Stetson
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
